an5.27:1.2: Samadhim, bhikkhave, bhavayatam appamanam nipakanam patissatanam panca nanani paccattanneva uppajjanti.
an5.27:1.4: ‘Ayam samadhi paccuppannasukho ceva ayatinca sukhavipako’ti paccattanneva nanam uppajjati,
an5.27:1.5: ‘ayam samadhi ariyo niramiso’ti paccattanneva nanam uppajjati,
an5.27:1.7: ‘ayam samadhi santo panito patippassaddhaladdho ekodibhavadhigato, na sasankharaniggayhavaritagato’ti paccattanneva nanam uppajjati,
an5.27:1.8: ‘sato kho panaham imam samapajjami sato vutthahami’ti paccattanneva nanam uppajjati.
an5.27:2.1: Samadhim, bhikkhave, bhavetha appamanam nipaka patissata.
an5.27:2.2: Samadhim, bhikkhave, bhavayatam appamanam nipakanam patissatanam imani panca nanani paccattanneva uppajjanti”ti.
